Body.Content:
We are launching Create an app description with Copilot for Power Apps. Available in Managed Environments, this AI feature allows makers to generate and save model-driven app descriptions. This feature will be will be generally available on January 14, 2025.

How does this affect me?
In the app designer for model-driven applications, makers can leverage artificial intelligence to generate descriptions for their applications. This functionality is available in the Publish dialog or within the App Settings panel, where makers have the option to produce an app description. The generated description can then be reviewed by the makers and saved as part of the application.

What do I need to do to prepare?
This message is for awareness and no action is required.

Title: Power Apps - Create an app description with Copilot
